content: New Publication: STU Update 3.2 of the QI-Core implementation guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/STU32/
new Publication: Release 1.0 of the Argonaut Clinical Notes implementation guide: http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut/clinicalnotes/1.0.0
new Publication: Release 1.0 of the Argonaut Questionnaire implementation guide: http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut/questionnaire/1.0.0
Thanks to GG for his help on getting this done.
I have corrected all published versions of FHIR as described here: http://hl7.org/fhir/r4/errata/CTO_Errata_Letter_FHIRR4_20190418.pdf
new Publication: STU3 of the US Core implementation guide: http://hl7.org/implement/standards/fhir/us/core/STU3
Congrats Lynn - this is the first IG published by someone other than me
new Publication: 1st STU ballot of the Da Vinci Health Record Exchange (HRex) Implementation Guide Release 0.1.0: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-hrex/2019Jun
new Publication: 1st STU ballot of the Da Vinci US Drug Formulary STU Ballot release 0.1.0: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-drug-formulary/Jun2019/
new Publication: 1st STU ballot of the Da Vinci Electronic Clinical Data Exchange (CDex) Implementation Guide Release 0.1.0: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-cdex/2019Jun
new Publication: 1st STU ballot of the Da Vinci Payer Data Exchange (PDex) Implementation Guide Release 0.1.0: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex/2019Jun
new Publication: STU 2 publication for HL7 FHIR® Profile: Pharmacy; Medication, Release 2 of the US Meds Implementation Guide: http://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/meds/STU2
new Publication: STU 1 of the FHIR Bulk Data Access implementation guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/STU1/
new publication: STU 1 of the FHIR IG: Electronic Long-Term Services and Supports (eLTSS) Release 1 - US Realm: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/eltss/STU1
if you wish to follow FHIR publications from HL7 in your preferred feed reader, you can now subscribe to http://hl7.org/fhir/publication-feed.xml (it's an RSS feed)
New Publication: STU 2 of the Healthcare Associated Infection Implementation Guide http://hl7.org/fhir/us/hai/STU2
new Publication: STU3.1 of the US Core implementation guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU3.1
New Publication: STU1 of the Genetic Reporting Implementation Guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/STU1
New Publication: STU1 of the Quality Measures for FHIR STU3 Implementation Guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/cqfmeasures/STU1
new Publication: STU1 of the Davinci-DQEM implementation guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/STU1/
new Publication: R5 Preview #1 (stable version for Sydney Connectathon): http://hl7.org/fhir/2020Feb
New Publication: STU 1 of the Occupational Data for Health IG: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/odh/STU1
New Publication: STU 1 of the DaVinci Payer Data Exchange US Drug Formulary IG: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/Davinci-drug-formulary/STU1

New Publication: STU 1 of the Bidirectional Services eReferral (BSeR) FHIR Implementation Guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/bser/STU1/

New Publication: STU 4 of the Quality Improvement Core (QI-Core) Implementation Guide
(aka HL7 FHIR® Profile: Quality, Release 1 - US Realm): http://hl7.org/fhir/us/qicore/STU4/
New Publication: STU 1 of the Minimal Oncology Data Elements (mCODE) Implementation Guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/STU1/

New Publication: STU2 of the Data Exchange for Quality Measures Implementation Guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/STU2
new Publication: STU 3.1.1 - Technical Errata Correction of the US Core implementation guide: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU3.1.1

New Publication: STU1 of the HL7 FHIR® Implementation Guide: FHIR to CDISC Joint Mappings, Release 1: http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/cdisc-mapping/STU1
